[req]
default_bits = 2048
prompt = no
default_md = sha256
req_extensions = req_ext
distinguished_name = dn
 
[ dn ]
C=US
ST=New York
L=Rochester
O=End Point
OU=Testing Domain
emailAddress=your-administrative-address@your-awesome-existing-domain.com
CN = www.your-new-domain.com
 
[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ cert_ext ]
# IAS response body encoded in base64
1.2.840.113741.1337.2=critical,ASN1:UTF8String:
# <x-iasreport-signing-certificate> The IAS signing root certificate, one DER encoded certificate
1.2.840.113741.1337.3=critical,ASN1:UTF8String:

# x-iasreport-signing-certificate, everything but the root, 1+ DER encoded certificates
1.2.840.113741.1337.4=critical,ASN1:UTF8String:

# x-iasreport-signature
1.2.840.113741.1337.5=critical,ASN1:UTF8String:

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = your-new-domain.com
DNS.2 = www.your-new-domain.com
